titles.title: Relating to members of the Quapaw Tribe of Oklahoma (O-Gah-Pah).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee Indian and Alaska Native Affairs.

bill.summary: 5/30/2012--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay, out of money not otherwise appropriated, unspecified sums to the Quapaw Tribe of Oklahoma (O-Gah-Pah) and to its tribal members pursuant to a judgment rendered by the U.S. Court of Federal Claims.
